Class Stereo

      • getMap

        public static Image getMap(Image left,
                           Image right,
                           Size windowSize)
        Create map of distance base on 2 images.
        Parameters:
        left - Left image.
        right - Right image.
        windowSize - Size of image for detect same pixels.
        Returns:
        Map of distance.

      • getMap

        public static Image getMap(Image left,
                           Image right)
        Create map of distance base on 2 images.

        Uses 10 % (percent) of image width by default window size.

        Parameters:
        left - Left image.
        right - Right image.
        Returns:
        Map of distance.
